    • Class uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.WorldRender

      class WorldRender extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • allVehicles
          List<Vehicle> allVehicles
          List of all vehicles in the simulation (for rendering)
        • animationStepPixels
          int animationStepPixels
          How many pixels vehicles move forward each animation tick
        • bottomCrossing
          CrossingTrack bottomCrossing
          The crossing track at the bottom of the grid
        • carriageEastImg
          BufferedImage carriageEastImg
          Image for carriage facing east (right)
        • carriageNorthImg
          BufferedImage carriageNorthImg
          Image for carriage facing north (up)
        • carriageSouthImg
          BufferedImage carriageSouthImg
          Image for carriage facing south (down)
        • carriageWestImg
          BufferedImage carriageWestImg
          Image for carriage facing west (left)
        • crossingImg
          BufferedImage crossingImg
          Image for crossing tracks
        • crossingReplacements
          Map<Position,TrackCell> crossingReplacements
          Stores original track cells when crossings are added so they can be restored
        • derailmentLabel
          JLabel derailmentLabel
          Label that displays derailment messages in the UI
        • grassImg
          BufferedImage grassImg
          Image for grass background cells
        • locoEastImg
          BufferedImage locoEastImg
          Image for locomotive facing east (right)
        • locomotiveHistories
          Map<Locomotive,List<uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.WorldRender.HistoryEntry>> locomotiveHistories
          A Map that stores the movement history for each locomotive.

          The key is a Locomotive object, and the value is a List of HistoryEntry objects showing where that locomotive has been. Each locomotive has its own separate history list, so carriages attached to different locomotives follow different paths.

          Think of it like each locomotive having its own diary that records everywhere it goes.

        • locoNorthImg
          BufferedImage locoNorthImg
          Image for locomotive facing north (up)
        • locoSouthImg
          BufferedImage locoSouthImg
          Image for locomotive facing south (down)
        • locoWestImg
          BufferedImage locoWestImg
          Image for locomotive facing west (left)
        • path
          List<Position> path
          The path that trains follow around the track
        • pathIndex
          int pathIndex
          Current index in the path (for tracking progress)
        • pathOrient
          List<Orientation> pathOrient
          The direction trains should face at each point on the path
        • railImg
          BufferedImage railImg
          Image for rail tracks (kept for backwards compatibility)
        • reverseMode
          boolean reverseMode
          Whether trains are currently moving in reverse
        • tickListener
          Runnable tickListener
          Callback invoked after each tick for UI updates
        • timer
          Timer timer
          Timer that triggers animation updates
        • topCrossing
          CrossingTrack topCrossing
          The crossing track at the top of the grid
        • world
          GameWorld world
          The game world containing all the cells and game objects
